# cmccloudv2_keypair (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cmccloudv2_keypair" "keypair1" { 
    name = "keypair-zn75"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `name` (String) Filter by name of keypair (case-insenitive), match exactly
- `type` (String) Filter by type of keypair (case-insenitive)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `fingerprint` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
